name: CompositeTransformUtil
author: Nipype (interface), Brian B. Avants et al. (tool)
description: CompositeTransformUtil, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.ants, interface: CompositeTransformUtil).

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Input transform file(s).

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Output file path (only used for assembly).

inputs.name: Output prefix
inputs.description: A unicode string. A prefix that is prepended to all output files (only used for disassembly).

inputs.name: Process
inputs.description: 'assemble' or 'disassemble'. What to do with the transform inputs (assemble or disassemble).

output-files.name: Affine transform
output-files.description: A file name. Affine transform component.

output-files.name: Displacement field
output-files.description: A file name. Displacement field component.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A file name. Compound transformation file.
